blog.name: itsjustashipperlife
blog.title: ⎊Love You 3000⎊
blog.description: Sanrion/Jorleesi | Pepperony | Sweenett | Jackelica | Hayffie | Cherik | Johnlock | Wolfstar | JokerXHarley... [From itsjustdepp Tumblr]

tags: im never going to be apparently
im never going to be over this
pep u said we would be okay... but NONE OF US ARE OK
NOT U NOT MORGAN NOT ANY OF THE IRONFAM AND DEFINITELY NOT US
summary: So Avengers 1 is on TV rn
body:
So Avengers 1 is on TV rn

And I’ve just heard “Agent Romanoff, you miss me?” and I just fucking screamed “YESS” I do miss you, you idiot… pls come back 😭😭😭 (also, Nat’s smile… fuck 😭)

Pep, you said we would be okay… but we are not 😫

blog.name: laurelismyblackcanary
blog.title: Random stuff everywhere
blog.description: I'm Italian. Older than 20 but younger than 30. This used to be a mostly Arrow blog but they killed off Laurel so now I couldn't care less about the show. Sometimes I'll post about Arrow and Laurel but mostly now it's just a place where I write everything that comes to mind

summary:
Peter Parker in Endgame: We won. 
Me: No, you fucking didn't. You defeated Thanos but you lost IronMan and BlackWidow. You...
body:
Peter Parker in Endgame: We won.

Me: No, you fucking didn’t. You defeated Thanos but you lost IronMan and BlackWidow. You didn’t win. Fuck you movie.

blog.name: laufire
blog.title: a spell is no more than a recipe for change

question: Bucky, Ned, Phil Coulson :)
answer:
(Firefox went ahead and collapsed when I was almost done with this ask asdflkañsdjf I hate everything xDD)

  • most heartbreaking moment?

Do you even need to ask??? Tony’s death, duh.

Just. Everything about it was gutting. Rhodey arriving first, caressing his face, too overwhelmed to say a word; Peter babbling, unable to deal with the situation (me too, me too); his last word being a soft “Pep”.

AND PEPPER. MY GAL. She broke my heart the most. She comforted him, kept a smile on until he couldn’t see her anymore, and then her face crumbled and she kissed him goodbye on the cheek… my heart ;__;

  • favorite villain?

In terms of who I like more as a character, I guess I’d say it’s Killmonger? I like Ghost a lot more, but I don’t really see her as a villain-villain, so.

But as a villain, my favourite will always be Obadiah. Shit was ugly, and personal, with him, in a way it hasn’t been with anyone else. I felt that. He was a great foil for Tony (btw, I’ve read somewhere that the original plan was to make Howard the villain in IM1 and reveal Obadiah as a bad guy in IM2 and… I would’ve killed to see that, ngl :P).

Bonus: it seems I’m on the minority on this, but I actually think Thanos was a good villain LOL. His self-righteousness and his delusions were universe-sized and it really made me buy him as a threat. And I think he provided parallels and anti-parallels for a lot of my fave characters and moments that really paid off *shrugs*.

  • the moment you fell in love with your favorite character?

I already ~sensed the fave potential in Tony in IM1, but it was the beginning on IM2 that sold it for me. His showmanship vs. his private moments when you discover his illness, his attitude in the hearing… everything in that movie had me “OMG I LOVE HIM” and “OMG I RELATE TO HIM SO MUCH” and “OMG THIS HURTS BUT KEEP IT COMING” xDDD. I was basically gone as soon as he described himself as the “greatest phoenix metaphor in human history”. I literally whispered “oh no” because I knew I would never be free LMFAO.

blog.name: galileoqueen-mama-mia
blog.title: Luke And Sierra
blog.description: 𝑾𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝒐𝒇 𝒂𝒍𝒍 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒍𝒐𝒗𝒆𝒓 𝒐𝒇 𝒂𝒍𝒍 𝒇𝒂𝒏𝒅𝒐𝒎𝒔. 5𝒔𝒐𝒔.

summary: Peter Parker x Reader: “It’s for the best…”  SUMMARY: Sometimes you fall in love. When you fall in love; you make sure that one...
body:
Peter Parker x Reader: “It’s for the best…”

SUMMARY: Sometimes you fall in love. When you fall in love; you make sure that one special person in your life is safe. But nobody ever said when becoming an Avenger - when becoming a superhero, you would have to make sacrifices that would kill you. That would cut so deep. But Peter.. he loved you so much. He promised he would never stand over your grave. Because he was Spider-Man, and he had more enemies then he could count. It was for the best that you stayed safe then dead.

NOTE: I’m sorry. Please excuse the grammar

“You always hurt the ones you love, the one, you shouldn’t hurt at all. You always take the sweetest rose and crush it till the petals fall. You always break the kindest heart with the hasty word you can’t recall. So if I broke your heart last night night, It’s because I love you most of all.” - Blue Valentine

   Your body jumps at the small tap against your bedroom window, you were just about to fall asleep until Peter had shown up at your fire escape. You throw the sheets off your body and walk towards the window, unlatching the lock and pull it up with a small grunt. The late night signs and the sound of soft traffic fill your ears as he pulls off his mask to reveal tousled brown hair, cuts and bruises. You gasp.

   “Peter? What are you doing up?!”

   He smiles weakly at you as he pulls himself into your room, his arm slings around your shoulders as you sit him down gently on the end your bed. His words stutter out of his mouth, he speaks quickly and in a state of panic. “I-I.. it’s just-t… I didn’t k-know..” You pull out the first aid underneath your bed. “Shhh, Peter calm down.” You shush him, you grab the bottle of alcohol and squeeze it onto the cotton pad in your hand. He winces with each tap and dab, first his face and then his torso. Which was littered with cuts and bruises, irritated and bloody his hand grasps your wrist. You drop the washcloth and pad, your face inches away from your boyfriend. You had just gotten him back. Five years being trapped and now you were here, terrified of what’s going to come out of his mouth.

   His eyes are bruised and puffy, red and irritated. He kisses you roughly. You don’t respond until after five seconds because; this isn’t Peter. Peter Parker would never just kiss you out of the blue, Peter Parker was gentle. “Peter.” You manage to escape in between the kiss.

   “This isn’t you.”

   “I haven’t been me in months.”

   “I know he’s gone but you shouldn’t-“

   “We have to break up.”

   Your mouth opens up to say something, anything. But all there is is silence. “What?” You ask. He’s silent and tears only begin to fall. “I-I can’t have you h-here. And be like Mr. Stark I can’t lose you. I can’t.. I can’t kill you.”

   “Peter you won’t get me killed-“

   “I can’t lose you if I don’t have you. I-I Y/N I can’t get you killed.” He cries. It seems painful. His bruised eyes. They look like they hurt, but he’s hurting you. “Peter.. That’s not fair.”

   He stands up in front of you, his height overruling you in every way. He’s Spider-Man, not my Peter. Just New York City’s Spider-Man from Queens. Before you can say anything he kisses your cheek one last time and heads for the fire escape. “It’s for the best Y/N.”

   And he leaves.

Authors Note: I’m sorry.

Tag List: @fabulaee @r0ger-tayl0r @5sos-wdw @leahluhve @spidreling @miss2001babe @magicwithaknife @ma-ntequilla @mhftrs @teenwolflover28 @bon-bon-salvatore @yourealegendroger @rebelrebelyourefaceisamess @bitemerog @myfreakydeaky @someonenotspecial-blog @youngbloodholland @thewinchesterchronicles @smilinghardy @realclassact @gwilymbenjoerami @lolasbookdream @psychedliczebra @wonderwoman292 @cookies186 @thesecondlastjedi @supremebesson @am-inotmerciful @david-bowies-wig-is-my-religion @marequeenii @officially-emo @killer-queen-ofrhye @everybodyplaythegame @sarahgirllolsblog @philosophical-dumbass @fruityfreddie @canyounotkaia @thebohemianpenguin @wingardiumleviosa93-4 @doublebubblediscodeacy @captain-katey @alli-cat-winer @notevenlxvely @sportsxnetflix @rockyroadthepastryarchy @ilovefigs-blog @loverfilm @mountainousdinosaur @wassupitschloe @experimenta27 @strangemaximoff @rara-de-nacimiento @peachllobotomy @2ptonpt @lune–chaos @tir-3-d @boqueeniancracksody @fatbottomedcurls

Tag List: @fabulaee @r0ger-tayl0r @5sos-wdw @leahluhve @spidreling @miss2001babe @magicwithaknife @ma-ntequilla @mhftrs @teenwolflover28 @bon-bon-salvatore @yourealegendroger @rebelrebelyourefaceisamess @bitemerog @myfreakydeaky @someonenotspecial-blog @youngbloodholland @thewinchesterchronicles @smilinghardy @realclassact @gwilymbenjoerami @lolasbookdream @psychedliczebra @wonderwoman292 @cookies186 @thesecondlastjedi @supremebesson @am-inotmerciful @david-bowies-wig-is-my-religion @marequeenii @officially-emo @killer-queen-ofrhye @everybodyplaythegame @sarahgirllolsblog @philosophical-dumbass @fruityfreddie @canyounotkaia @thebohemianpenguin @wingardiumleviosa93-4 @doublebubblediscodeacy @captain-katey @alli-cat-winer @notevenlxvely @sportsxnetflix @rockyroadthepastryarchy @ilovefigs-blog @loverfilm @mountainousdinosaur @wassupitschloe @experimenta27 @strangemaximoff @rara-de-nacimiento @peachllobotomy @2ptonpt @lune–chaos @tir-3-d @boqueeniancracksody @fatbottomedcurls
trail.content:
Peter Parker x Reader: “It’s for the best…”

SUMMARY: Sometimes you fall in love. When you fall in love; you make sure that one special person in your life is safe. But nobody ever said when becoming an Avenger - when becoming a superhero, you would have to make sacrifices that would kill you. That would cut so deep. But Peter.. he loved you so much. He promised he would never stand over your grave. Because he was Spider-Man, and he had more enemies then he could count. It was for the best that you stayed safe then dead.

NOTE: I’m sorry. Please excuse the grammar

“You always hurt the ones you love, the one, you shouldn’t hurt at all. You always take the sweetest rose and crush it till the petals fall. You always break the kindest heart with the hasty word you can’t recall. So if I broke your heart last night night, It’s because I love you most of all.” - Blue Valentine

   Your body jumps at the small tap against your bedroom window, you were just about to fall asleep until Peter had shown up at your fire escape. You throw the sheets off your body and walk towards the window, unlatching the lock and pull it up with a small grunt. The late night signs and the sound of soft traffic fill your ears as he pulls off his mask to reveal tousled brown hair, cuts and bruises. You gasp.

   “Peter? What are you doing up?!”

   He smiles weakly at you as he pulls himself into your room, his arm slings around your shoulders as you sit him down gently on the end your bed. His words stutter out of his mouth, he speaks quickly and in a state of panic. “I-I.. it’s just-t… I didn’t k-know..” You pull out the first aid underneath your bed. “Shhh, Peter calm down.” You shush him, you grab the bottle of alcohol and squeeze it onto the cotton pad in your hand. He winces with each tap and dab, first his face and then his torso. Which was littered with cuts and bruises, irritated and bloody his hand grasps your wrist. You drop the washcloth and pad, your face inches away from your boyfriend. You had just gotten him back. Five years being trapped and now you were here, terrified of what’s going to come out of his mouth.

   His eyes are bruised and puffy, red and irritated. He kisses you roughly. You don’t respond until after five seconds because; this isn’t Peter. Peter Parker would never just kiss you out of the blue, Peter Parker was gentle. “Peter.” You manage to escape in between the kiss.

   “This isn’t you.”

   “I haven’t been me in months.”

   “I know he’s gone but you shouldn’t-“

   “We have to break up.”

   Your mouth opens up to say something, anything. But all there is is silence. “What?” You ask. He’s silent and tears only begin to fall. “I-I can’t have you h-here. And be like Mr. Stark I can’t lose you. I can’t.. I can’t kill you.”

   “Peter you won’t get me killed-“

   “I can’t lose you if I don’t have you. I-I Y/N I can’t get you killed.” He cries. It seems painful. His bruised eyes. They look like they hurt, but he’s hurting you. “Peter.. That’s not fair.”

   He stands up in front of you, his height overruling you in every way. He’s Spider-Man, not my Peter. Just New York City’s Spider-Man from Queens. Before you can say anything he kisses your cheek one last time and heads for the fire escape. “It’s for the best Y/N.”

   And he leaves.

Authors Note: I’m sorry.

Tag List: @fabulaee @r0ger-tayl0r @5sos-wdw @leahluhve @spidreling @miss2001babe @magicwithaknife @ma-ntequilla @mhftrs @teenwolflover28 @bon-bon-salvatore @yourealegendroger @rebelrebelyourefaceisamess @bitemerog @myfreakydeaky @someonenotspecial-blog @youngbloodholland @thewinchesterchronicles @smilinghardy @realclassact @gwilymbenjoerami @lolasbookdream @psychedliczebra @wonderwoman292 @cookies186 @thesecondlastjedi @supremebesson @am-inotmerciful @david-bowies-wig-is-my-religion @marequeenii @officially-emo @killer-queen-ofrhye @everybodyplaythegame @sarahgirllolsblog @philosophical-dumbass @fruityfreddie @canyounotkaia @thebohemianpenguin @wingardiumleviosa93-4 @doublebubblediscodeacy @captain-katey @alli-cat-winer @notevenlxvely @sportsxnetflix @rockyroadthepastryarchy @ilovefigs-blog @loverfilm @mountainousdinosaur @wassupitschloe @experimenta27 @strangemaximoff @rara-de-nacimiento @peachllobotomy @2ptonpt @lune–chaos @tir-3-d @boqueeniancracksody @fatbottomedcurls

He promised he would never stand over your grave. Because he was Spider-Man, and he had more enemies then he could count. It was for the best that you stayed safe then dead.

NOTE: I’m sorry. Please excuse the grammar

“You always hurt the ones you love, the one, you shouldn’t hurt at all. You always take the sweetest rose and crush it till the petals fall. You always break the kindest heart with the hasty word you can’t recall. So if I broke your heart last night night, It’s because I love you most of all.” - Blue Valentine

title: ⚠️End game spoilers⚠️
body:
Me:*crying bc I was looking at photos of tony so I have a reference to draw from*
Dad: why are you crying 
Me: tony stark died 
Dad: this is the third time you cried get over it he's not real 
Me:*in my brain* he was real too me and was my all time favorite alone with peter. He showed me how to be brave and still be sassy

summary: If you listen to Who Lives, Who Dies, Who Tells Your Story and don’t think of Pepper picking up her husband’s mantle of altruism...
body: If you listen to Who Lives, Who Dies, Who Tells Your Story and don’t think of Pepper picking up her husband’s mantle of altruism and seeing Morgan grow into more of her daddy everyday; and thinking of when she’ll see Tony again and don’t cry, you have no soul.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Impossible Years
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VgsoyJ

by apisdn

The plan was to send him back to just before the Chitauri invasion, but Peter doesn’t end up where he’s supposed to. Instead he lands in 2010, alone and dying from genetic alterations that were activated too early.
Unsure what to do, he tries to fix everything but as time goes on, he starts to lose more and more of himself, pieces chipped off by his own mistakes and the things he needs to do to achieve his goals.
He might not be a hero, or a son, or a nephew, or even a good person anymore, but he still has a purpose.
Save Tony Stark.

Words: 5389, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Guardians of the Galaxy (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Loki, Stephen Strange, Yondu Udonta, Garthan Saal, Peter Quill, Bucky Barnes, Natasha Romanoff, Nick Fury, Peter Quill’s Grandfather, Mantis (Marvel), Rocket Raccoon, Groot (Marvel), Drax the Destroyer, Gamora, Izzy Kane, Sam Alexander, Nova Prime - Character, Carol Danvers
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Guardians of the Galaxy Team, Loki & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Stephen Strange, Loki & Stephen Strange, Peter Parker & Everyone
  • Additional Tags: Time Travel, Not A Fix-It, Emotional Hurt, Artificial Intelligence, Pop Culture, Genetic Engineering, Body Horror, Cold blooded Murder, Protective Peter Parker, BAMF Peter Parker, Everyone Needs A Hug, Villain Peter Parker, Sort Of, He’s still Peter, he just… doesn’t do the hero thing, and has a singular purpose for living, Collateral Damage, Murder, Smuggling, College, Some things get better. Some get worse, Alternate Universe - Time Travel, This Cinnamon Roll Will Kill You, Everyone in the MCU is fully prepared to parent Peter Parker
